TopicTitle: Add shrouds for solid boosters as in KSP1

Articles.Content:
Add shrouds for solid boosters in KSP2, because this capability was in KSP1. Now you are unable to make solid rocket upper stages, but I in KSP1 made several rockets with 3-4 serial solid stages as some vehicles in real life. I don't want to miss some creative solutions for early stages of campaign and in general
As proof I found rocket with serial solid stages, because I don't want to reinstall KSP1
https://kerbalx.com/LaytonVu226/solid-science
